title: Donald
brief_description: Released to celebrate 50 years in show business, this video presents a selection of Donald’s finest moments. Individual titles include: “Donald’s cousin Gus”, “The Riveter”, “The Autograph hound”, “A Good time for a dime”, “Donald’s tire trouble”, “Drip dippy Donald” and “The New neighbour”. The compilation is introduced by rare film footage of Walt Disney. No other production details available.
